item.title: About
item.description:
I am junior faculty at the Institute of Physics and Astronomy (IFA) of Universidad de Valpara√≠so, Chile. My current research interests span computational cosmology and astrophysics, Numerical Relativity and High-Performance Computing (HPC).

I was previously a postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Computer Science of the University of Durham, UK. I did my PhD at the Institute for Computational Cosmology at the University of Durham.
